verses.verse: וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these שְׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> Now these [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> which came מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt אֵ֣ת <S%H854><s%> with יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> with Jacob אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man וּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and his household בָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> came
רְאוּבֵ֣ן <S%H7205><s%> Reuben שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> Simeon לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> Levi וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> and Judah
יִשָּׂשכָ֥ר <S%H3485><s%> Issachar זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> Zebulun וּבְנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin
דָּ֥ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan וְנַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> and Naphtali גָּ֥ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <S%H836><s%> and Asher

וַֽיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All נֶ֛פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> And all the souls יֹצְאֵ֥י <S%H3318><s%> that came out יֶֽרֶךְ־ <S%H3409><s%> of the loins יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> were seventy נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> souls וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> for Joseph הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> was in בְמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> was in Egypt

וַיָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> died יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> and all his brethren וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all הַדּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> and all that generation הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פָּר֧וּ <S%H6509><s%> were fruitful וַֽיִּשְׁרְצ֛וּ <S%H8317><s%> and increased abundantly וַיִּרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> and multiplied וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <S%H6105><s%> mighty בִּמְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> exceedingly מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> exceedingly וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> was filled הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for פ

וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> Now there arose up מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king חָדָ֖שׁ <S%H2319><s%> a new עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> over Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> which knew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> not Joseph

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people הִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> Behold the people בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> [are] more וְעָצ֖וּם <S%H6099><s%> and mightier מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

הָ֥בָה <S%H3051><s%> Come on נִֽתְחַכְּמָ֖ה <S%H2449><s%> let us deal wisely ל֑וֹ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or יִרְבֶּ֗ה <S%H7235><s%> with them lest they multiply וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תִקְרֶ֤אנָה <S%H7122><s%> and it come to pass that when there falleth out מִלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> any war וְנוֹסַ֤ף <S%H3254><s%> join גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> they עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֹׂ֣נְאֵ֔ינוּ <S%H8130><s%> also unto our enemies וְנִלְחַם־ <S%H3898><s%> and fight בָּ֖נוּ וְעָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> against us and [so] get them up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> out of the land

וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Therefore they did set עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> over שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> captain מִסִּ֔ים <S%H4522><s%> discomfited לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of עַנֹּת֖וֹ <S%H6031><s%> to afflict בְּסִבְלֹתָ֑ם <S%H5450><s%> them with their burdens וַיִּ֜בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And they built עָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> cities מִסְכְּנוֹת֙ <S%H4543><s%> treasure לְפַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> for Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּתֹ֖ם <S%H6619><s%> Pithom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַעַמְסֵֽס׃ <S%H7486><s%> and Raamses

וְכַאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> they יְעַנּ֣וּ <S%H6031><s%> But the more they afflicted אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> them the more יִרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> they multiplied וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> and the more יִפְרֹ֑ץ <S%H6555><s%> and grew וַיָּקֻ֕צוּ <S%H6973><s%> And they were grieved מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel
וַיַּעֲבִ֧דוּ <S%H5647><s%> to serve מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H6531><s%> with rigour

וַיְמָרְר֨וּ <S%H4843><s%> bitter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַיֵּיהֶ֜ם <S%H2416><s%> their lives בַּעֲבֹדָ֣ה <S%H5656><s%> bondage קָשָׁ֗ה <S%H7186><s%> with hard בְּחֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H2563><s%> in morter וּבִלְבֵנִ֔ים <S%H3843><s%> and in brick וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> and in all manner of service בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבֹ֣דָתָ֔ם <S%H5656><s%> all their service אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> wherein they made them serve בָהֶ֖ם בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H6531><s%> [was] with rigour

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> spake מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <S%H3205><s%> midwives הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <S%H5680><s%> to the Hebrew אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> of whom שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> of which the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> of the one שִׁפְרָ֔ה <S%H8236><s%> [was] Shiphrah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> of the other פּוּעָֽה׃ <S%H6326><s%> Puah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said בְּיַלֶּדְכֶן֙ <S%H3205><s%> When ye do the office of a midwife אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעִבְרִיּ֔וֹת <S%H5680><s%> to the Hebrew women וּרְאִיתֶ֖ן <S%H7200><s%> and see עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָאָבְנָ֑יִם <S%H70><s%> [them] upon the stools אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> if it [be] a son הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> you וַהֲמִתֶּ֣ן <S%H4191><s%> then ye shall kill אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בַּ֥ת <S%H1323><s%> him but if it [be] a daughter הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> she וָחָֽיָה׃ <S%H2425><s%> then she shall live

וַתִּירֶ֤אןָ <S%H3372><s%> feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <S%H3205><s%> But the midwives אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> commanded אֲלֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H413><s%> as מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> not as the king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <S%H2421><s%> alive אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <S%H3206><s%> the men children

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֔ת <S%H3205><s%> for the midwives וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֔ן מַדּ֥וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> unto them Why עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ן <S%H6213><s%> have ye done הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <S%H2421><s%> alive אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <S%H3206><s%> the men children

וַתֹּאמַ֤רְןָ <S%H559><s%> said הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <S%H3205><s%> And the midwives אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> not כַנָּשִׁ֛ים <S%H802><s%> women הַמִּצְרִיֹּ֖ת <S%H4713><s%> [are] not as the Egyptian women הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <S%H5680><s%> Because the Hebrew כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because חָי֣וֹת <S%H2422><s%> for they [are] lively הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in בְּטֶ֨רֶם <S%H2962><s%> ere תָּב֧וֹא <S%H935><s%> come in אֲלֵהֶ֛ן <S%H413><s%> and הַמְיַלֶּ֖דֶת <S%H3205><s%> and are delivered וְיָלָֽדוּ׃ <S%H3205><s%> the midwives

וַיֵּ֥יטֶב <S%H3190><s%> dealt well אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> Therefore God לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֑ת <S%H3205><s%> with the midwives וַיִּ֧רֶב <S%H7235><s%> multiplied הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <S%H6105><s%> mighty מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> and waxed very

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because יָֽרְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <S%H3205><s%> And it came to pass because the midwives אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> that he made לָהֶ֖ם בָּתִּֽים׃ <S%H1004><s%> them houses

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> charged פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> all his people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every הַבֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> Every son הַיִּלּ֗וֹד <S%H3209><s%> that is born הַיְאֹ֙רָה֙ <S%H2975><s%> into the river תַּשְׁלִיכֻ֔הוּ <S%H7993><s%> ye shall cast וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַבַּ֖ת <S%H1323><s%> and every daughter תְּחַיּֽוּן׃ <S%H2421><s%> ye shall save alive ס
